page.title: 12THE CHURCH IN NEWTON.
page.content: Nominally most people belong to the Anglican Church and at Christmas and Harvest most attend church..The 5 churches in the block belong to a group parish of 12 churches cared for by 1 priest and 1 lay-reader.Within the group there are normally several services each Sunday and occasionally a single group service after which coffee is served and there is the opportunity to socialise.It is hoped that this will make people happier to attend services in other churches when there is none in their own.The 24 churchwardens,the lay-reader and the Rector as chairman form a group council through which parish administration is dealt with and church problems considered.
